Entries.Resort_Shore: The sound of the waves is so calming...$1#$b#I could get lost in the rhythm of the ocean.$1
Entries.Resort_Umbrella: This shade is perfect! A break from the sun while still enjoying the view.$1
Entries.Resort_Chair: Ah, this chair is so comfortable! I could nap here for hours.$1
Entries.Resort_Wander: There’s so much to explore here! Every corner has a little piece of paradise.$1
Entries.Resort_Bar: I wonder if they have any fruity mocktails? Something refreshing would be nice!$1
Entries.Resort: This place is paradise!$1#$b#I feel like I could spend all day relaxing here...$1
Entries.Resort_Entering: I can't believe I’m heading to Ginger Island!$1#$b#I’ve heard the views are breathtaking.$1
Entries.Resort_Leaving: It was a great day, but it's time to get back to work...$2#$b#Hopefully, I can visit again soon.$1
Entries.Resort_bar: I’m not much of a drinker, but maybe just one won’t hurt...$2

Entries.Pauline: Wow! Thank you @. I love this!$1/22 395 254 834 72 216 237 720/How nice of you to give me this. Thanks!$0/211 223 222 234 728 730 -79 -81/Just so you know, I don't like this at all.$3/-2 -7 72 406 256 -12 190 272 307/You know, you're quite lazy for asking other people to throw away your garbage!$5/342 168 170 171 172/Hey, thanks!/424 426 306 307 308 428 446 78 725 726 768 769 224 -4 142 721 -74/

Entries.Pauline0: I can’t believe this is happening!$4#$b#I’ve always dreamed of a day like this, but I never imagined it would be with someone who means so much to me...$4#$b#Yes! A thousand times, yes!$4
Entries.Pauline1: I used to think I knew what happiness was, but being here with you, I realize it’s so much more.$4#$b#I’d be honored to spend the rest of my life by your side... Yes, I’ll marry you.$4

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Pauline... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Pauline... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Pauline in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Pauline in the bonds of marriage.
